import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './Magazine.scss'; import $ from 'jquery'; import page1 from '../../static/images/page1.png'; import page2 from '../../static/images/page7.png'; import page3 from '../../static/images/page3.png'; import page4 from '../../static/images/page6.png'; import page5 from '../../static/images/page5.png'; import page6 from '../../static/images/page6.png'; import mag1 from '../../static/images/mag1.png'; import mag2 from '../../static/images/mag2.png'; import mag3 from '../../static/images/mag3.png'; import logotrips from '../../static/images/logotrips.png'; import etendre from '../../static/images/etendre.png'; class Magazine extends Component { state = { } magazines = [ { id:1, nom: "magazine 1", couverture: mag1, date:'01-05-2020', pages: [page1,page2,page3,page4,page5,page6] }, { id:2, nom: "magazine 2", date:'01-05-2020', pages: [page1,page2,page3,page4,page5,page6] }, { id:3, couverture: mag1, nom: "magazine 3", date:'01-05-2020', pages: [page1,page2,page3,page4,page5,page6] } ] selectedmagazine = { id:3, couverture: mag1, nom: "magazine 3", date:'01-05-2020', pages: [page1,page2,page3,page4,page5,page6] }; selectedPage = page1; pageIndex = 0; hauteurPage(){ $(document).ready(()=>{ document.getElementById("container").style.minHeight="100vh"; document.getElementById("container").style.maxHeight="100vh"; }); } clearInterval(){ let idI=parseInt(sessionStorage.getItem("idInterval")); console.log(idI); clearInterval(idI); } constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = {date: new Date(),magazines:this.magazines,selectedmagazine:this.selectedmagazine,selectedPage:this.selectedPage,indexPage:this.pageIndex}; this.clearInterval(); // this.hauteurPage(); $("document").ready(()=>{ this.switchV(1); } ); } selectMagazine(magazine,index){ this.setState({selectedmagazine:magazine,selectedPage:magazine.pages[0],indexPage:index}); } selectMagazineItem(page,index){ this.setState({selectedPage:page,indexPage:index}); } nextPage(){ let index = this.state.indexPage; let page = ""; if((index + 1) < this.state.selectMagazine.pages.length){ index = index +1 page = this.state.selectMagazine.pages[index] this.setState({selectedPage:page,indexPage:index}); }else{ page = this.state.selectMagazine.pages[0] this.setState({selectedPage:page,indexPage:0}); } } nextPage(){ let index = this.state.indexPage; let page = ""; if((index - 1) >= 0 ){ index = index - 1; page = this.state.selectMagazine.pages[index] this.setState({selectedPage:page,indexPage:(index)}); }else{ index = this.state.selectMagazine.pages.length - 1; page = this.state.selectMagazine.pages[index] this.setState({selectedPage:page,indexPage:index}); } } switchV(el){ switch(el){ case 1:{ document.getElementById("zoom").style.display="none"; break; } case 2:{ document.getElementById("zoom").style.display="block"; break; } } } render() { return (

); } } export default Magazine;
